The implementation is complete. Here's a summary:

## Enhanced flow-convert - PRD Maintenance and Repair Tool

### Files Created/Modified

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `bin/flow-convert.sh` | CLI with flags `--validate-only`, `--force-repair`, `--verbose`, `--all`, `--force` |
| `.claude/lib/lock.sh` | PRD-level and story-level locking with heartbeat-based stale lock detection |
| `.claude/hooks/prd-utils.js` | Added `discoverMCPs()`, `validateSchema()`, `repairPRD()`, `syncMemory()` functions |
| `.claude/skills/flow-convert/SKILL.md` | Added STEP 8-11 (validate schema, repair, memory sync, generate report) |
| `bin/test-flow-convert.sh` | Automated test suite with 10 test cases |

### New CLI Commands

```bash
# Validate a PRD
flow-convert --validate-only my-feature

# Repair a PRD
flow-convert --force-repair my-feature --verbose

# Process all PRDs
flow-convert --all --validate-only
flow-convert --all --force-repair

# Run tests
./bin/test-flow-convert.sh
```

### Test Results

All 10 tests passed:
- Validate missing fields
- Validate valid PRD
- Repair invalid mavenSteps
- Repair add missing acceptance criteria
- Detect circular dependencies
- Atomic write rollback on error
- Backup creation
- Lock acquire and release
- Lock prevents concurrent access
- Discover MCPs
